sect1.title: Hardware requirements
sect1.para: The &slemreg; operating system can be deployed on a wide range of hardware. It is impossible to list all the different combinations of hardware &sls; supports. However, to provide you with a guide to help you during the planning phase, the minimum requirements are presented here.
If you want to be sure that a given computer configuration will work, find out which platforms have been certified by &suse;. Find a list at .

listitem.para: Most CPUs available at time of release are supported.

The maximum number of CPUs supported by software design is 8192 for &intel64; and &amd64;. If you plan to use such a large system, verify with our hardware system certification Web page for supported devices, see .
&slema; requires at least 1GB RAM. Bear in mind that this is a minimal value for the operation system, the actual memory size depends on the workload.
The minimum hard disk space is 12GB. But the recommended value is 20GB of hard disk space. Adjust the value according to workloads of your containers.
